item.title: |kai ka !gaoken, a poison used by 'Grass Bushmen'
item.summary: An insert in which Lloyd notes the making of a poison used, and feared, by 'Grass Bushmen'. It seems that grubs are used.
item.comments: 1) This story is found in Book IV-1
item.storypages: not numbered (an insert inside front cover of A2_1_44)
item.author: ||kabbo (Jantje) (II)

keyword.subkw: a poison made by 'Grass Bushmen' called |kai ka !gaoken
made by 'Grass Bushmen' from grubs and feared
a poison made by, called |kai ka !gaoken
